agree_newsletter: I Agree to Receive the Newsletter

area_of_interest_label: Select a minimum of one interest up to a maximum of three

password_form_error: Password and password confirmation fields doesn't match

personal_data_processing: I consent to the processing of personal data including sensitive personal data, for the purposes of managing my request pursuant to the GDPR
profiling: Pursuant To Art. 6.1.A Of The Regulation, I Agree To The Processing Of My Personal Data For The Purpose Of Allowing Fondazione To Improve Its Services And To Offer Personalised Content Based On My Interests, Needs And Preferences ('Profiling')
